doc:
Adelaide Klein https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adelaide_Klein 0 Adelaide Klein (1900–1983) was an actress who performed on radio, television, films, and the stage. She was best known for her dialects as a radio performer. Over the course of her thirty-year career, Klein performed in radio comedies and soap operas, appeared in eight shows on Broadway, four films, and on thirteen television series. She died at the age of 82 in 1983. Adelaide_Klein ( 1900 – 1983 ) was an_actress who performed on radio_,_television_,_films , and the_stage . She was_best_known for her_dialects as a_radio_performer . Over the_course of her_thirty-year_career , Klein performed in radio_comedies and soap_operas , appeared in eight_shows on Broadway , four_films , and on thirteen_television_series . She died at the_age of 82 in 1983 .
